title: Sweet onions with lentil stew
description: This lentil stew is so comforting – the warm spices are given a delicious lift by the mouth-watering, sweet caramelised onions.This meal provides 471 kcal, 25g protein, 51g carbohydrate (of which 13.5g sugars), 19g fat (of which 10.5g saturates), 14g fibre and 1.5g salt per portion.
ingredients: a good handful, chopped unsmoked bacon or pancetta
